sense.name: one level of rooms in a multi-floored building
sense.commentary: STOREY[+structure][+architectural][+level][+of_building][+multi_floored] Note: variant spelling of 'story' meaning the same thing (NOT a tale)
sense.examples: That skyscraper has 101 stories. His penthouse is on the eight storey, which is the top floor of the apartment building.
